examples: Airport security was extra tight in the wake of yesterday's bomb attacks.

words.defineEn: a large place where planes take off and land, with buildings and other facilities, in which passengers wait for their flights
words.defineVi: một nơi rộng rãi, nơi máy bay cất cánh và hạ cánh, với các tòa nhà và cơ sở vật chất khác, trong đó hành khách đợi chuyến bay của họ

examples: The parents eagerly awaited the arrival of their first baby.

The scent of wild cherry blossoms filled the air, signaling the arrival of spring.
With the arrival of the new year, it's time to ring out the old and set new goals for personal growth and development.
As the season changes, I can't wait for the first bite of a juicy Victoria plum to mark the arrival of summer.
words.defineEn: the act of arriving at a place from somewhere else
words.defineVi: hành động đến một nơi từ một nơi khác

words.defineEn: the area where one leaves one's suitcases, bags, etc. to be loaded onto a plane
words.defineVi: khu vực để hành lý, túi xách, v.v... để chất lên máy bay

examples: That was me, that was me at the baggage claim.

words.defineEn: the area at an airport where passengers can collect their cases, bags, etc. after they land
words.defineVi: khu vực tại sân bay nơi hành khách có thể lấy vali, túi xách, v.v. sau khi hạ cánh

examples: He gave her ticket to the woman at the check-in desk.

words.defineEn: the process of reporting one's arrival at an airport or a hotel

examples: Right in the middle of the review is a left-handed compliment: the critic praises the actor for his "startling career departure."

words.defineEn: the act of leaving, usually to begin a journey
words.defineVi: hành động rời đi, thường là để bắt đầu một cuộc hành trình

words.defineEn: the part of a fence or wall outside a building that we can open and close to enter or leave a place
words.defineVi: phần của hàng rào hoặc bức tường bên ngoài tòa nhà mà chúng ta có thể mở và đóng để vào hoặc rời khỏi một nơi

examples: She carefully lifted the ginger tuber from the soil.

Students with disabilities have priority access to the lift.

words.defineEn: a box-like device that goes up and down and is used to get to the different floors of a building

words.defineEn: a building where trains, buses, planes, or ships start or finish their journey
words.defineVi: một tòa nhà nơi xe lửa, xe buýt, máy bay hoặc tàu bắt đầu hoặc kết thúc hành trình của họ

examples: My grandmother was off her trolley, unfortunately.

words.defineEn: the place at an airport or port where passengers' bags are checked for illegal goods as they enter a country
